caption: This is a bass guitar jam in the style of funk. It is an instrumental performance. The bass guitar is playing a complex solo using the slap technique. There is a backing track composed of a programmed acoustic sounding drum beat. There is a groovy atmosphere to it. This piece could be used in the opening theme of a tutorial/unboxing YouTube channel.
